title: Workflow Processes & Admin & Miscellaneous Budget
body:
We have 30k CRE8R tokens available for Vision Mission Branding and Content Marketing over 3months. 

The plan was for working groups to form and propose budget / plan for themselves for the remaining 70k that has been approved. 

It has become apparent that this is dragging and we need to be able to pay out tokens for workflow processes (systems design, setup, improvement) and admin (all the stuff that we do on a daily basis that keeps the DAO functioning). 

This proposal bundles up all that into one thing 70k CRE8R tokens over 3 months for everything. 

I have had countless conversations that go like this: 

Person 1: "OK thing x needs to get done do we have budget for that? And which working group should this be organised under? 

Person 2: "Oh that should go under workflow and processes but we have not passed the snapshot for that yet. Hmm should  we just put it under vision mission branding?

Person 3 "Nah thats disorganised. We really need to get around to making the snapshot for workflow and processes. 

/end

Well this is that snapshot. 

Examples of how this budget is to be spent. 

-Admin-

Admin of website, YT channel, discord, token streaming, social media accounts, tools, google drive, trello,  MULTISIG*. 

*See Fugu's new financial section which is extremely valuable to keep our finances organised. He has done that will zero certainty about getting paid (because there is no budget for that stuff defined) this proposal fixes that. 

-Workflow / Processes-

Go checkout the workflow processes channel to see all the stuff we are already working on. And we are only scratching the surface.

70k is max budget for 3 months it does not have to all get spent. It does not mean all of it will be distributed.
choices: No. Peeps should jst work 4 free
author: 0x069e85D4F1010DD961897dC8C095FBB5FF297434
